body:
I would personally give
 
300k to charity/food pantries
200k in stocks
300k in personal things/ college
100k give to the poor
100k put intro research for cancer

thats what i would do
what would you

replies.body: I'd probably give it all away, I mean I'm only 14 for fucks sake. If I kept it I'd blow it all on parties n shit until I'd ran out money or on the streets .-. This is all assuming I just got it given, if I worked for that 1mil then I'd give away 400k probably and keep the rest for a small home, car and other shits (because lets face it, by the time I'd worked for that money I'd be old enough for that stuffs)
